meanings.sent1: She is the testiest person in the office when she hasn't had her morning coffee.
meanings.sent2: The cat became testiest when its tail was accidentally stepped on.
meanings.sent3: Even the testiest squirrel in the park couldn't resist a tasty acorn offered by a little girl.
meanings.sent4: The testiest storm clouds gathered ominously in the sky, ready to unleash their fury.

meanings.sent2: After waiting for hours, he grew testiest and started tapping his foot impatiently.
meanings.sent3: The testiest driver on the road honked angrily at every red light, as if it could make them turn green faster.
meanings.sent4: Her testiest glare could make even the bravest person feel uneasy.
meanings.sent5: The testiest toddler in the daycare threw a tantrum when his favorite toy was taken away.

meanings.definition: Having a tendency to argue or be confrontational
meanings.sent1: The testiest lawyer in the firm never backed down from a legal challenge.
meanings.sent2: During the debate, he became testiest when his opponent questioned his expertise.
meanings.sent3: The testiest rooster in the coop always started a squabble over the best spot for sunbathing.
meanings.sent4: Her testiest remarks cut through the room, sparking a heated discussion.
meanings.sent5: The testiest politician in the election campaign never missed a chance to engage in a verbal duel.
